SELECT a.id, a.user_code userCode, a.pwd_num_enc pwdNumEnc, a.user_name userName, a.user_photo userPhoto, a.user_idcard userIdCard, a.user_sex sexName, a.user_lock userLock, (SELECT c.user_name FROM sys_eve_user c WHERE a.creater = c.id) createName, (SELECT group_concat(distinct b.role_name) FROM sys_eve_role b WHERE INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.role_id, ','), CONCAT(',', b.id, ','))) roleName, m.company_name companyName, m.department_name departmentName, m.job_name jobName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime FROM sys_eve_user a LEFT JOIN (SELECT o.user_id, p.job_name, q.department_name, u.company_name FROM company_user o, company_job p, company_department q, company_mation u WHERE o.company_id = u.id AND o.department_id = q.id AND o.job_id = p.id) m ON a.id = m.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.user_code like '%${userCode}%'
AND a.user_name like '%${userName}%'
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
